fullplot: Four friends share one major concern: the opposite sex. These Casanovas are constantly obsessed about their relationships with women; they meet in a cafè on a regular basis to discuss their scheme to score sex-dates with the most beautiful girls. (Spanish with English subtitles)

title: Cafè solo o con ellas
